DescriptionData.Title: TAG 1-Stroke Split Cakes - 3 Color Pearl Red/White/Blue (30 gm)
DescriptionData.Description:
TAG Pearl Red, White & Blue 1-Stroke Custom Split Cake can be applied with a sponge or wide brush to easily paint stunning, colorful designs.
This Split Cake includes 3 Pearl Colors: Pearl Red, Pearl White and Pearl Blue. TAG Pearl Face Paints have softer consistency than TAG Regular paints. They create shining metallic effects using cosmetic Mica (and not metallic pigments).
TAG Face Paint has a high quality, wax-based formulation that allows designs to flex with body movements without peeling or cracking. TAG blends in easily and stays gentle on skin. Most TAG colors are great for line work and lighter colors show well over darker ones. TAG has a soft, creamy consistency and can be activated with less amount of water than comparable brands. It is comfortable to wear and easy to apply and remove.
TAG Pearl Red, White & Blue 1-Stroke Custom Split Cake is hypoallergenic and made with non-toxic, US FDA approved, cosmetic, skin safe ingredients.
30 gm Split Cake is good for 60 - 150 applications.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Professional Face Painting cake containing 3 Pearl colors
Pearl Red, Pearl White & Pearl Blue
1.06 ounces (30 grams) is good for 60 - 150 applications
